scripts.stop: npm run wp db export sql/local.sql && wp-env stop
scripts.test:unit:php: wp-env run composer run-script install-theme && wp-env run phpunit 'phpunit -c /var/www/html/wp-content/plugins/snow-monkey-archive-content/.phpunit.xml.dist --verbose'
scripts.zip:pack: rsync -a --exclude='/vendor' --exclude='/node_modules' --exclude='.*' --exclude='*.config.js' --exclude='*.xml.dist' --exclude='*.ruleset.xml' --exclude='/bin' --exclude='/tests' --exclude='package*.json' . snow-monkey-archive-content && cd snow-monkey-archive-content && composer install --no-dev
scripts.zip: npm run clean:zip && npm run zip:pack && npm run zip:archive
